cards.description: Open a savings account with Argent Bank today!

icons.description: Need to talk to a representative? You can get in touch through our 24/7 chat or through a phone call in less than 5 minutes.
icons.title: You are our #1 priority

icons.description: The more you save with us, the higher your interest rate will be!
icons.title: More savings means higher rates

icons.description: We use top of the line encryption to make sure your data and money is always safe.
icons.title: Security you can trust
